We're looking for a Python Developer to join our growing team and help us optimize the performance of our web-based applications. This role is perfect for recent graduates or early-career professionals who want to work with modern Python frameworks and data tools in a collaborative environment.

🛠️ What You’ll Do:

Develop, test, and maintain scalable Python code using Django

Excellent communication and teamwork skills

💼 Job Title: Python Developer with Apache Airflow
 📍 Location: Jersey City, NJ (Hybrid – 2–3 days onsite per week)
 📄 Job Type: Long-Term Contract

📌 Position Overview
We are seeking an experienced Python Developer with Apache Airflow expertise 

🔹 Key Responsibilities
⚙️ Design, develop, and implement workflows using Apache Airflow to replace existing 3rd-party RPA modules.
🐍 Develop and optimize Python scripts for automation, integration, and data transformation.
☁️ Deploy, monitor, and scale Airflow workflows using Azure Cloud services (Azure Data Factory, Azure DevOps, Azure Storage).
📑 Maintain clear documentation of workflows, configurations, and technical processes.
👨‍🏫 Mentor junior developers and promote Airflow & Python best practices.

🛠 Required Technical Skills
🐍 Python programming: REST / FastAPI development, scripting, data transformation, process automation, database integration.
🔄 Strong experience in Apache Airflow workflow orchestration.
☁️ Hands-on with Azure Cloud technologies: Azure Data Factory, Azure DevOps, Azure Storage.
📈 Proven experience migrating processes from legacy systems or RPA modules.
🧠 Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.

Please share updated resume on Chetnad@arborteksys.com
